page.title: 03Clubs (Harold Wood Area)
page.content: Our class looked at leisure activities outside school. We found that the most popular activity was swimming especially with younger children. This was followed by Tuesday club and then the Brownies and Guides. Not so many boys belong to cubs and scouts.Quite a few children are learning to play an instrument or are having dancing lessons. The piano was the most popular instrument and ballet the most popular dance. Six children in our school are having horse riding lessons and three boxing lessons.
